content:
What is the difference between Encounter.type and Encounter.serviceType? What are the recommended valuesets for these elements since binding is "example" ? What will be real life scenario associated with both?
Reference: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179190-united-states/topic/US.20Core.20Encounter.2EserviceType/near/228542287
Both names are confusing, so seemingly need to be swapped or renamed. Encounter.type is for specific service types(0..*); Encounter.serviceType is for more broader types, such as specialties(0..1).
@Brian Postlethwaite @Irma Jongeneel
